about_the_game:
The official soundtrack of The Big Journey game. Track list is six catchy, toe-tapping acoustic ukulele tunes perfect for going on an adventure of your own with, or relaxing with and letting the breeze roll over you.

Artist: Choconuts
Format: FLAC

Tracklist:
  1. Watching Over - 3:02
  2. All I Got is You - 1:59
  3. This World - 2:42
  4. Book of Life - 2:53
  5. Deep Desert - 1:53
  6. Big Journey - 3:08
  7. Big Journey (Ukulele) - 3:07
